title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 730.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 730.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Definitions in
section
2
of the

Transportation Law apply to this Part. The following additional definition also
applies: tariff means a publication stating the fares, rates, charges, classification ratings, and regulations in connection therewith, applying to
the transportation of passengers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
730.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
